relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's SASE & SSE Platform
relatedBlades.subtitle: Secure hybrid work with Internet-native Zero Trust
relatedBlades.copy:
- Eliminate implicit trust while providing consistent experiences for remote and office users alike
- Secure access, defend against threats, and protect sensitive data including code
- Tackle your Zero Trust journey one step at a time with composable security products converged on one platform
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Ready to talk to an expert? Click here to get in touch.](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/plans/enterprise/)

features.title: Improve team productivity
features.description: Simplify policy management, troubleshoot issues faster, and improve the end user experience with a unified, low-latency Zero Trust platform.

features.title: Reduce cyber risk
features.description: Protect against multi-channel phishing and ransomware and reduce your attack surface by leveraging Cloudflare's broad threat intelligence.

features.title: Improve tech efficiency
features.description: Accelerate digital maturity and consolidate point products with composable, in-line security services that provide holistic visibility into your network traffic.

features.title: Cloudflare is the only new vendor in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for SSE
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. We believe our recognition validates our commitment to continue advancing our Zero Trust platform to help secure hybrid work.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 Forrester Waveâ„¢ for Enterprise Email Security
features.description: Cloudflare tied for the top score in the strategy category, and received the highest scores possible in the criteria of vision and innovation. We believe this recognition highlights our rapid pace of innovation and groundbreaking approach to protecting users and data across all channels.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
features.description: IDC cites Cloudflare's "aggressive product strategy to support enterprise security needs." We believe our recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size get started with Zero Trust and secure access for any user to any resource, without VPNs.

imageAssetFile.title: IDC Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust platform
relatedBlades.copy:
- One uniform and composable platform for easy setup and operations.
- Single-pass inspection for all traffic to ensure consistent, high-speed protections.
- 100% uptime SLA for paid plans that only an Anycast architecture can deliver.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Verify, filter, isolate, inspect on all devices you manage, and even devices you don't.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust marketecture graphic (lt blue bg)

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Secure access__ - Simultaneously improve user experience and accelerate IT integration while securing access between any user and app, on any device, in any location, without a VPN.
- __Threat defense__ - Defend against multi-channel phishing and ransomware threats across distributed workplaces and remote workers.
- __Data protection__ - Unify visibility and controls for sensitive data across all environments to mitigate risk and stay compliant.

relatedBlades.title: Modernize security on your journey to Zero Trust
relatedBlades.description: Ensure all traffic in and out of your business is verified and authorized. Check dynamic context to "never trust and always verify" every request.

columnContent.title: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
columnContent.description: Enforce default-deny, Zero Trust rules for users accessing all your applications, faster and safer than a VPN.

columnContent.title: Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
columnContent.description: Secure and inspect corporate Internet traffic to help prevent phishing, ransomware, and other Internet risks.

columnContent.title: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
columnContent.description: Provide Internet threat and data protection by running code away from endpoints, without sacrificing performance.

columnContent.title: Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB)
columnContent.description: Easily secure SaaS tools, granularly control user access, and protect sensitive data.

columnContent.title: Cloud Email Security
columnContent.description: Preemptively protect your users from phishing, business email compromise (BEC), and email supply chain attacks.

columnContent.title: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
columnContent.description: Inspect HTTP/S traffic for sensitive data like PII and prevent exfiltration with allow or block policies.

columnContent.title: Magic WAN
columnContent.description: Connect and secure your branch offices, headquarters, data centers, cloud VPCs and SD-WANs using the Cloudflare network.

columnContent.title: Magic Firewall
columnContent.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN, without backhauling traffic or creating choke points.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Firewall as a Service - Magic Firewall
iconAssetFile.title: Firewall as a service icon

relatedBlades.title: Tackle Zero Trust one step at a time

buttonOne.elementName: Talk to an Expert zero trust enablement button

buttonTwo.elementName: Compare All Plans zero trust enablement btn

features.title: Simple, flexible architecture
features.description: Fast-track your journey to secure any-to-any connectivity. Cloudflare uniformly connects and secures end-to-end using one network and control plane.

features.title: Trusted, secure connectivity
features.description: Ensure reliable and scalable network connectivity with consistent protection from any location. Deliver [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) for your business using the same Cloudflare proxies that route ~20% of all websites.

features.title: Faster, future-proof innovation
features.description: Stay ahead of modern business needs to secure your future. Cloudflare is known to build and ship quickly, achieving rapid, native adoption of new Internet and security standards.

relatedBlades.title: See Zero Trust in action
relatedBlades.copy: In this nine-minute tour of Cloudflare Zero Trust, you'll see the behind-the-scenes admin setup and live end user experience for use cases like endpoint security posture enforcement, identity-based Zero Trust rules, and protection from zero-day threats.
relatedBlades.button1Text: Or take an interactive, self-guided tour

relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust as a bridge to SASE
relatedBlades.copy:
For many organizations, modernizing security with Zero Trust is a critical step towards a broader network transformation, embodied by the [Secure Access Service Edge (SASE)](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-sase/) model. 

Learn how Cloudflare Zero Trust fits into our SASE offering, Cloudflare One, and our approach to transforming security and connectivity.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Explore Cloudflare One, our SASE platform

relatedBlades.quote: "At Delivery Hero, we always strive to deliver an amazing experience to our customers. Cloudflare Access helps us do the same for our internal teams: offering them a secure working environment, and removing the need for a VPN to access all of our applications across the globe."

quoteCarousel.quote: "OneTrust relies on Cloudflare to maintain our network perimeter, so we can focus on delivering technology that helps our customers be more trusted. With Cloudflare, we can easily build context-aware Zero Trust policies for secure access to our developer tools. Employees can connect to the tools they need so simply teams don't even know Cloudflare is powering the backend. It just works."

"JetBlue Travel Products needed a way to give crew-members secure and simple access to internally-managed benefit apps. Cloudflare Zero Trust Services gave us all that and more - a much more efficient way to connect business partners and crew-members to critical internal tools."

"Cloudflare Access saved us from having to develop our own Identity and Access Management (IAM) system. We don't have to build user permission functions into the apps that Access protects. We went all in; everyone in the company has a seat."

"Zero Trust is very important, but it's also incredibly difficult to implement. The only way ezCater can succeed with this is to have the right partner. Cloudflare has given us the foundation for a successful Zero Trust implementation."

"IT is evolving by leaps and bounds, and more sophisticated, more destructive cyber threats are emerging every day. Zero Trust is the only viable security model in this environment, and Cloudflare is making it a lot easier for eTeacher Group to get there."

"Discord is where the world builds relationships. Cloudflare Zero Trust Services helps us deliver on that mission, connecting our internal engineering team to the tools they need. With Cloudflare, we can rest easy knowing every request to our critical apps is evaluated for identity and context - a true Zero Trust approach."

"POLITICO needed a way to control access to specific critical resources without the risk and overhead of connecting through a private corporate network. Cloudflare Access aligns with how and where our team works, while helping us embrace a Zero Trust security model, where every request to every app is evaluated for user identity - and no VPN is required."
quoteCarousel.quoteTitle: Senior Director, Technology Operations and Cybersecurity
